description:
‘YOKOCHO COIN’ is the coin for payment at ‘Bar Yokocho’, which has been expanding its business throughout japan.

And it’s the first in japan to be installed self air drop function on ERC223.

As of now, there are Bar Yokocho at Kamata/Tokyo, Akasaka/Tokyo and Karasuma/Kyoto. And totally 28 restaurants are in these 3palcecs,

There will be the problem to pay on each restaurant at the place where customer will hop another restaurant like bar culture in Spain.

Therefore, ‘Bar Yokocho’ has already introduced accepting payment by prepaid transportation card, ORIGAMI PAY and credit card.

And this time, from this autumn, ‘Bar Yokocho’ will start accepting payment by YOKOCHO COIN to boost convenience,

Furthermore, try to got to be able to accept payment by YOKOCHO COIN at other restaurants and other YOKOCHO, and what we strongly think and try to achieve is that YOKOCHO COIN will create real community through YOKOCHO and restaurants all over the world.
name: YOKOCHO COIN
